properties.areaDesc: Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Eastern Pondera; Toole
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 2 at 10:24AM MST until March 4 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph, with
gusts up to 65 mph occurring. For the High Wind Watch, west
winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible.

* WHERE...Toole, Eastern Pondera and Southern Rocky Mountain
Front.

* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 4 PM MST this
afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday evening
through Wednesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Blowing dust will reduce visibility to near zero at
times. Gusty winds could blow down tree limbs and power lines.
Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Listen to NOAA Weather Radio or your local media for the latest
updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
